argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cardon | |- ( card ` A ) e. On |
| 2 |  | #P_cardon | |- ( card ` B ) e. On |
| 3 |  | #P_oacl | |- ( ( ( card ` A ) e. On /\ ( card ` B ) e. On ) -> ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) e. On ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2an | |- ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) e. On |
| 5 |  | #P_cardacda | |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ B e. dom card ) -> ( A +c B ) ~~ ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ensymd | |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ B e. dom card ) -> ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ~~ ( A +c B ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_isnumi | |- ( ( ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) e. On /\ ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ~~ ( A +c B ) ) -> ( A +c B ) e. dom card ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 7 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ B e. dom card ) -> ( A +c B ) e. dom card ) |
